channel.title: Tree cutting thing
channel.description:
I was just thinking that can I somehow make my auto willow cutter & banker wait until that tree is down what it is choppng, so it finds next tree only when old tree is down?
And other question: Can i make it to find tree color itself like it finds willowcolor if there reads text 'Chop down Willow'?

item.title: Tree cutting thing
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

What i did in my powercutter was i made it find the colour and yadda yadda then it uses IsUpTextMulti(‘Chop’,‘down’,‘Willow’) and then it would repeat findnormal randoms until((Not (IsUpTextMulti(‘Chop’,‘down’,‘Willow’))) or InvFull) (i added in other stuff this is just example)

that way it waits until it cant find Chop down Willow, because you move and stuff as king keen said, you could try using FindColorSpiral

Read full topic

item.title: Tree cutting thing
item.dc:creator: @King_Keen King Keen
item.description:
@King_Keen wrote:

1337.:

Maybe you could make it keep checking to see in the colour of the tree is where it was last time… or use istextup to see if it says ‘chpo down’ or whatever…

That dosnt work to well, when you click on the tree your character might move and the camera moves slightly over time, so thats out of the question, I think.

Just do a wait or something…
If the sound plugin worked scripts could be made more reliable, shame it dosn’t. :rolleyes:

Read full topic
